item.description:
The event you have all been waiting for!

Since I started this club a few months ago, I have been getting requests from all of you to hold the first event. Well finally, the TIME HAS COME!

Announcing the First Boston Karaoke Meetup! This Meetup will be held in Boston at the Limelight Stage and Studios!!!! It is conveniently located in the Theatre District in Boston.

Please join me at 8:00PM at the club, we'll have our own Karaoke Box and we'll have fun taking turns!!!

I look forward to meeting all of you and enjoying some Karaoke!

- Phil
item.name: Announcing the First Boston Karaoke Meetup
